entry.title: DIG - 12'' Pop-Up Indicator w/ 24" Micro Tubing and 1/4'' Barb - DSPI-12B
entry.summary:
Vendor: DIG
Type: Drip Tools
Price: 8.45

The DSPI series micro pop-up indicators are designed to provide a clear visual verification when drip irrigation valves are open. The DSPI series popup indicator utilizes a double seal and an extra-large red color indicator which pops up when a drip irrigation system is pressurized and running.

Features and Benefits
  • Large red color indicator is clearly visible from a distance
  • Unique design incorporates a pressure activated, low friction, upper stem seal and a second stage piston seal to ensure reliable operation
  • Can be installed with Excel? dripline, poly tubing, PVC or used with any drip irrigation system
  • Ideal for sub surface systems and densely planted sites
  • Rugged materials can withstand adverse conditions
Specifications
  • Operating Pressure: 15-35 PSI (1-2.4 BAR)
  • Nominal Operating Pressure: 30 PSI (2.1 BAR)
  • Pop Up Indicator Height: > 12" (30.5 cm) retracted to 21" (53.34 cm) extended
Materials
  • Cylinder: Polyethylene
  • Housing: Acetal
  • O-ring: Buna-N
  • Spring: Stainless steel 304
  • Red flag: High impact plasticwith UV
  • Black sleeve: High impact plastic with UV

entry.title: DIG - 3mm Drip Deluxe Punch Tool w/ Cutter- 16-065
entry.summary:
Vendor: DIG
Type: Drip Tools
Price: 22.98

Pro Punch
Easily punch holes in 1/2" poly tubing when connecting 1/4" micro tubing or drippers to the main line. Cutter will easily cut through any 1/4'' or 1/2'' Drip Irrigation Tubing

Punches

DIGs drip irrigation hole punches are designed to easily punch a clean hole in any size of drip tubing for the insertion of drip emitters, micro sprinklers and 1/4" barbed fittings. The punches are designed to remove the residual debris formed as the hole is created in the drip tubing, protecting the drip emitters and micro sprinklers from plastic debris that can, over time, plug the system. The small punch is inexpensive and the deluxe gun punch is heavy duty with an optional replacement of the stainless steel pin.

Features

  • Used to puncture holes when installing drip emitters and micro sprinklers in polyethylene tubing
  • Designed to remove the residual debris formed as the hole is created in the drip tubing
  • Easy-grip handle constructed of durable plastic and non-corrosive materials
  • The deluxe-pro-punch stainless steel pins can be replaced
  • Constructed of UV-resistant, high-impact plastic
  • The deluxe professional punch can be used for punching a large number of holes into drip tubing

Product specifications

  • Pin size for small punch: 1/4" with .170 OD (4 mm)
  • Pin size for professional punch: .110 OD (3 mm)
  • Material:
    • Handle and housing: high-impact plastic
    • Pin: stainless steel

About

The Palm Hole Punch and the Pro Punch are used to punch holes in any size of drip tubing for the insertion of drip emitters, micro sprinklers, 1/4" barbs and 10/32 threaded barbs.
When using this punch, make sure to punch the hole in the center of the drip tubing and use a paper clip or pin from time to time to remove the debris stuck inside.

entry.title: Rain Bird - XMTOOL - Xerigation Xeriman All Purpose Tool
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Drip Tools
Price: 6.80

Rain Bird - XMTOOL - Xerigation Xeriman All Purpose Tool

  • Provides fast, easy, one-step installation of Xeri-Bug emitters, PC Modules and 1/4" barbed insert fittings
  • Cuts emitter installation time

Using the Emitter Tool

  • Step 1

    Place the Xeri-Bug Emitter on end of tool. Press barbed point into side wall of ½" Tubing.

    Note: The Emitter Tool also works with ¼" Barbed Couplings and with ¼" Barbed Tees.

  • Step 2

    Pull tool away, leaving the Xeri-Bug Emitter embedded in tubing.

  • Step 3

    Push ¼" tubing onto the Xeri-Bug Emitter.

  • Step 4

    To remove Xeri-Bug Emitters, use side of tool.

  • Step 5

    ¼" Tubing Plugs can be used to seal holes in ½" tubing. Use bottom of Emitter Tool to insert these plugs.

entry.title: Rain Bird - FITINSTOOL - XF Fitting Insertion Tool
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Drip Tools
Price: 6.98

  • 50% less effort required to install fittings than without a tool*
  • Firmly locks fittings into place while inserting the Dripline
  • Tool helps widen the dripline opening to make the fitting insertion easier
  • Solid grip and comfortable fit in hand
Rain Birds XF Insertion Tool assists you with installing XF Fittings in less time and with less effort. Installing fittings can be a grueling task at any job site. Not to worry, theres help. Introducing Rain Birds new XF Insertion tool. Your hands will thank you.
